articles.title: Kim Jong Un Convenes Operation Meeting, Finally Examines and Ratifies Plan for Firepower Strike
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Convenes Operation Meeting, Finally Examines and Ratifies Plan for Firepower Strike
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The moves of the U.S. imperialists to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and encroach upon its supreme interests have entered a grave phase.
					Not content with letting B-52 make sorties over south Korea in succession despite the repeated warnings, they made B-2A stealth strategic bomber and other strategic strike means fly from Whiteman air force base in Missouri State, the U.S. over south Korea on March 28 for the first time in history to commit such dangerous provocation as openly staging a drill for striking ground targets of the DPRK.
					
					This fully proves that the brigandish ambition of the U.S. imperialists for aggression to stand in confrontation with the DPRK has reached an extreme phase defying the meaningful warning made by its revolutionary armed forces in the March 26 statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					In view of the prevailing grim situation, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, convened an urgent operation meeting on the KPA Strategic Rocket Force's performance of duty for firepower strike at the Supreme Command at 00:30 Friday.
					
					Present there were Hyon Yong Chol, chief of the KPA General Staff, Ri Yong Gil, director of the Operation Bureau, Kim Yong Chol, director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau, and Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the Strategic Rocket Force.
					
					At the meeting he first received a report from General Kim Yong Chol, who is also vice chief of the General Staff of the KPA, on the information about the nature of action of the nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					After receiving a report from Lieut. General Kim Rak Gyom on the technical conditions of the strategic strike means of the KPA, he made an important decision.
					
					He said he has judged the time has come to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists in view of the prevailing situation.
					
					If they make a reckless provocation with huge strategic forces, the KPA should mercilessly strike the U.S. mainland, their stronghold, their military bases in the operational theaters in the Pacific, including Hawaii and Guam, and those in south Korea, he said. He examined and finally ratified the plan of the Strategic Rocket Force for firepower strike.
					
					The U.S. imperialists let B-2A make sorties over south Korea in succession, indicating once again that their hostile acts against the DPRK have entered a reckless phase, going beyond the phase of threat and blackmail, he said.
					
					B-2A's flight to the sky above south Korea is not a simple demonstration of forces in reaction to the tough stand of the DPRK but an ultimatum that they will ignite a nuclear war at any cost on the Korean Peninsula, he noted, underlining the need to put a definite end to the times when they could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with nukes. 
					
					He declared the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK would react to the U.S. nuclear blackmail with a merciless nuclear attack, and war of aggression with an all-out war of justice.
					
					He finally signed the plan on technical preparations of strategic rockets of the KPA, ordering them to be standby for fire so that they may strike any time the U.S. mainland, its military bases in the operational theaters in the Pacific, including Hawaii and Guam, and those in south Korea. 
					
					He said the enemies are bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war testing the DPRK's self-restraint, adding the DPRK can no longer tolerate this. He ordered the KPA to blow up and reduce everything to ashes at a single strike, if an order is issued.
					
					He said the heroic service personnel of the KPA and all other people, their hearts burning with irrepressible resentment at the reckless war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists, are now waiting for a final order of the WPK Central Committee, hardening their will to turn out in a do-or-die battle with the enemies.
					
					The KPA will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. imperialists' frantic moves for aggression but do its best to defend the destiny of the country and nation, he said.
					
					It is the truth confirmed by history that no force on earth can hold in check the people all out for the just cause, he noted, stressing if an undesired war breaks out on this land again due to the consequences of the unpardonable action of the U.S. imperialists, it will bring them a shameful ruin and the Korean nation will greet the bright day of national reunification.
					
					The important decision made by him under the grave situation where the Korean Peninsula has been pushed to the brink of a nuclear war by the U.S. imperialists will mark a turning point in putting an end to the history of the long-standing showdown with the U.S. and opening a new phase of history.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Achievements in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Achievements in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians and officials of the DPRK have made big scientific and technological achievements conducive to the building of an economic power and improvement of the people's living standard.
					Teachers of Kye Ung Sang College of Agriculture of Kim Il Sung University completed the research into the efficacy of active phosphoric acid treatment of seeds of crops which scientifically clarified its influence on the growth and yield of rice and maize seeds and introduced it into agricultural production.
					
					The researchers of the Bioengineering Branch succeeded in breeding virus-free potato and establishing the system of selecting its seeds, preventing epidemic of potato and remarkably increasing its yield.
					
					Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University developed and introduced an automatic control system of lifting electrodes on the basis of the study of scientific method of estimating the melting stage of the UHP electric arc furnace at the Chollima Steel Complex to suit specific conditions.
					
					Researchers of the Control Machine Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, in cooperation with workers of the Chollima Steel Complex, settled the issue of rationalize the amount of feeding material at revolving furnaces at the Posan Iron Works and its supply, production and management and established an automation control system of production processes.
					
					Teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology introduced advanced rolling process technology at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and established a new billet production system by relying on locally available fuel. They built a new heating oven based on high-temperature air combustion technology in the heat rolling shop in cooperation with workers of the complex.
					
					Scientists of the Sunchon area anthracite excavating research field studied and rounded off new inertial-type loading and transporting equipment in cooperation with technicians of the Chonsong Youth Coal Mine.
					
					Technicians and officials of the Rakwon Machine Complex manufactured a large oxygen plant whose total mass is one third than that of the preceding one and power consumption is half as compared with it.
					
					Many scientific and technological achievements were reported from the research institutes. They include successes made in establishing a new-type trolley bus production process and increasing the streptomycin production capacity.

articles.title: Stirrups Represent High-level Art of Metalwork of Koguryo Dynasty
articles.content:
Stirrups Represent High-level Art of Metalwork of Koguryo Dynasty
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Koguryo Dynasty (B.C. 277-A.D. 668), which lasted for nearly 1,000 years, was the strongest state in the Korean history.
					The mainstay in Koguryo's military was cavalry. So, big efforts were made to the development of harness, stirrups in particular.
					
					The fact was proven by stirrups discovered in one of the historical sites dating back to Koguryo.
					
					The stirrup, 23.8 cm high and 13.2 cm wide, is elaborately processed, covered with holed bronze sheet. Pictures of four guardians, seen mostly in Koguryo mural tombs, are carved in its ring.
					
					The stirrup, reminding one of a piece of bronze ornaments, gives a glimpse of the high-level art of hole-patterned metalwork of Koguryo.

articles.title: Anhwa Temple, Relics of Ancient Korea
articles.content:
Anhwa Temple, Relics of Ancient Korea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Anhwa Temple is located in Mt. Songak in Kaesong City, which was the capital of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), the first unified state in Korea.
					The temple, built in the year 930, is one of the historical relics symbolic of the period of Koryo. It was first called Anhwa Hall.
					
					There is a legend about the building of the temple.
					
					There were long-standing conflicts between Koryo and Paekje dynasties. In 925, an armistice was made between the two sides on the condition of exchanging hostages. Wang Sin, a cousin of Koryo's King Wang Kon, and Jin Ho, a son-in-law of Paeje's King Kyon Hwon, were taken hostages respectively.
					
					Then Jin Ho died of an illness six month after the hostage exchange, and Kyon Hwon punished Wang Sin for the misunderstanding that his son-in-law was killed by Koryo.
					
					Wang Kon saw to it that Anhwa Hall was built as a place to pray for the soul of his cousin. The hall was rebuilt on an expansion basis in 1118 and was renamed Anhwa Temple.
					
					Anhwa Temple, restored to its original state, is listed as one of national heritages in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

					If the enemies finally ignite a war of aggression, they will turn to ashes without having time to regret themselves over not paying due heed to the significant warning issued by the Supreme Command of KPA that they will have hardest time with their destiny at stake the moment they make a provocation.
					
					The strong countermeasures taken by the DPRK are not to threaten others but to defend the dignity and the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					No one on earth can check the people turned out for just cause.

articles.title: There Is No Prospect for Peaceful Settlement of DPRK-U.S. Relations: Minju Joson
articles.content:
There Is No Prospect for Peaceful Settlement of DPRK-U.S. Relations: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- An opportunity for peacefully settling the DPRK-U.S. relations is no longer available as the U.S. opted for staking its fate. Consequently, there remains only the settlement of accounts by a physical means. Minju Joson Friday says this in a bylined commentary.
					It is the U.S. which pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the extreme phase, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					The DPRK has so far made every possible effort with sincerity to prevent a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. has staged the drill for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK with huge forces for aggression involved. It has staged even the drill for nuclear strike under the simulated conditions of an actual war targeting the depth of the DPRK by inveigling even B-52 formation. Worse still, it worked out an operational plan for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and is watching for a chance to carry it into practice.
					
					All facts prove that the U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK have entered the phase of practical implementation to hurt the idea, social system, sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, after going beyond the phase of threat and blackmail. Herein lies the gravity of the issue.
					
					There were many military contradictions between the DPRK and the U.S. But the U.S. did not openly reveal its intent to stab a dagger into the DPRK on its back. This shows the U.S. is going reckless bereft of reason, being engrossed in the ambition for stifling the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK's army and people can never overlook the present grim reality in which the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership, which they regard more precious than their lives, are encroached upon.
					
					A battle to be fought by the DPRK against the U.S. will become a war for national liberation to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and, at the same time, a revolutionary war to defend the human cause of independence and the justice of the international community.

articles.title: U.S. Introduces B-2As into S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Introduces B-2As into S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists on Thursday let B-2As fly into the sky above south Korea to stage a drill for striking ground targets in the DPRK, south Korean KBS reported.
					Two B-2As based on the Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri State, the U.S. flew into the sky above the Jikdo firing range in the waters off Kunsan, North Jolla Province that day, staging a drill for dropping bombs all of a sudden.
					
					On March 26 the U.S. warmongers deployed in south Korea B-52 based on Guam which had been busy with a drill for dropping A-bombs on the DPRK.
					
					The reckless saber-rattling staged by the U.S. imperialists in south Korea through a repeated introduction of nuclear strategic forces is little short of an ultimatum that they will ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK at any cost.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-scale Mobile Tactical Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-scale Mobile Tactical Drills
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The 11th mechanized infantry division of the south Korean puppet army announced the plan to stage large-scale field mobile tactical drills in Hongchon and Hwachon areas in Kangwon Province of south Korea from April 1 to 5, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					It was reported that attack means including tanks and armored vehicles and huge forces of the division would be involved in the drills.
					
					The south Korean trigger-happy forces are getting frantic in their war drills by taking advantage of the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: New Anti-north War Scenario Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
New Anti-north War Scenario Criticized in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea made public a statement on March 25 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet  military group for working out a new war scenario against the north.
					The statement accused the U.S. and south Korean military authorities of signing "a plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war" on March 22, adding: It calls for including the "reinforcement in the north and its commanding forces" in the range of strike and introducing the U.S. forces to this end.
					
					This is a dangerous scenario for igniting an all-out war.
					
					It is clear that this scenario would get on the nerves of the north to increase the danger of a war in the light of the fact that the south-north relations were pushed to the worst phase under the Lee Myung Bak regime which pursued only the policy of confrontation with the north.
					
					The statement demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities roll back the war scenario at once.

articles.title: Politically-motivated Plot against Progressive Party under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Politically-motivated Plot against Progressive Party under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea made public a statement on March 25 denouncing the ruling party's politically-motivated plot against the opposition Unified Progressive Party.
					The statement accused the "Saenuri Party" of deciding on the examination of qualifications of two lawmakers from the Unified Progressive Party.
					
					The ruling party is taking issue with the course of selecting candidates for proportional representation of lawmakers from the Unified Progressive Party but prosecution's investigation had already cleared it of any suspicion, it said.
					
					It branded the ruling party's deliberate decision on the examination of qualifications without any legal ground as an act against democracy as it is little different from a coup at the "National Assembly."
					
					Such sudden farce staged by the "Saenuri Party" is a political retaliation against the criticism of the "presidential" candidate from the ruling party last year and a trick to undermine solidarity in the opposition camp and lay a self-justified ruling foundation, it held.
					
					It urged the "Saenuri Party" stop such act at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Settle Issue of Ssangyong Motors
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Settle Issue of Ssangyong Motors
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- More than 800 religionists of 15 parishes of the south Korean Catholic held a meeting in Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province on March 25, demanding the authorities settle the issue of Ssangyong Motors as early as possible.
					The unreasonable lay-off in the motors is prevailing in whole society, they deplored.
					
					The settlement of the issue means protecting the rights to labor and existence, they said, urging the authorities to comply with the demand of the dismissed workers staging a sit-in strike on dangerous transmission towers.
					
					They evinced their will to fight till the demands of those workers are met.

articles.title: Chongryon Central Committee Meets
articles.content:
Chongryon Central Committee Meets
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Fourth Meeting of the 22nd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on March 25.
					Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and members of its Central Committee and its Central Audit Committee.
					
					The meeting discussed the issue of channeling all efforts into the patriotic movement to cope with the grave situation in hearty response to the New Year's congratulatory message of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ho Jong Man in his report said Kim Jong Un in his New Year's congratulatory message clearly indicated the way to be followed by Chongryon, saying he will always stand by Chongryon organized by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					He underlined the need to conduct the more powerful patriotic movement than ever by dint of unity true to the idea and intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					He called upon all officials of Chongryon to devote their enthusiasm to defending the history and tradition of the Juche-based movement of Koreans in Japan and bringing the happiness to compatriots and the bright future to the rising generation.
					
					Then followed speeches.
					
					The meeting adopted the report as a decision of the enlarged meeting of the Chongryon Central Committee.
					
					It also discussed the issue of revising some rules of Chongryon and the issue of some reform of special departments of Chongryon Central Standing Committee and personal affairs.
					
					It adopted a letter to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian preparatory committee to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 23.
					The director of the Dombo Enterprise Company was elected chairperson of the committee.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Denmark
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was formed in Copenhagen on March 23 under the co-sponsorship of the Communist Party of Denmark and the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					A member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Denmark and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to hold colorful events to mark the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kimilsungias Conveyed to Guinean Botanical Garden
articles.content:
Kimilsungias Conveyed to Guinean Botanical Garden
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of conveying Kimilsungias was held at a Guinean botanical garden on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Displayed at the venue were photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association, referred to the details of the birth of Kimilsungia and its rapid spread to many countries, adding:
					
					After looking round a Kimilsungia exhibition held in Pyongyang, I was struck with admiration at the world people's respect for Kim Il Sung.
					
					We will make positive efforts to deeply study the great Juche idea and widely spread Kimilsungia in Guinea, regarding it as our duty to develop the friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					The director of the botanical garden said:
					
					I am glad to be able to cultivate immortal flower Kimilsungia in our botanical garden.
					
					Our garden will play a role of a pioneer in cultivating Kimilsungias to bring them into full bloom across Guinea.
					
					We will hold a Kimilsungia exhibition on the occasion of the Day of the Sun to make the feats and greatness of Kim Il Sung go down through generations in Guinea.
					
					Dozens of potted Kimilsungias were conveyed to  officials of the botanical garden at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Malaysia
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- It is the great honor and pride for the Korean people to uphold President Kim Il Sung as eternal leader. 
					The director of the Dombo Enterprise Company in Malaysia said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) held on March 23. He was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony. 
					
					He said in his speech that Kim Il Sung was the most prominent leader, peerlessly great man, great sage of mankind and elder statesman representing the 20th century whom the Korean people claimed for the first time in the nation's history spanning thousands of years.
					
					Kim Il Sung is still enjoying profound respect from not only the Korean people but also world progressives as the sun of mankind, he said.
					
					He stressed that the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the Korean People's Army could develop into the party, state and army of Kim Il Sung under the leadership of leader Kim Jong Il, the sun of Songun.

articles.title: Nuclear Deterrence for Self-defence Is Essential for DPRK: Brazilian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Nuclear Deterrence for Self-defence Is Essential for DPRK: Brazilian Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Bolstering of nuclear deterrent for self-defence is indispensable for the DPRK which is exposed to constant war threat from the U.S.
					Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said this in a statement on March 20.
					
					He denounced the U.S. imperialists and their allies and dutiful media for slandering the DPRK, adding:
					
					The DPRK has proposed several times replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty to create an atmosphere of stability and peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					But the U.S. did not accept the proposal and, on the contrary, has escalated military provocations against the DPRK in league with the south Korean puppet army, after deploying armed forces of aggression including nuclear weapons in south Korea.
					
					The sanctions inflicted on the DPRK by the UN Security Council at the instigation of the U.S. over its peaceful plan for space development and nuclear program have no ground and are intolerable in view of the principle of international law.
					
					The DPRK conducted a nuclear test with success recently.
					
					It needed to bolster nuclear deterrence in order to prevent a new war.
					
					But for the hostile policy and nuclear threat from the U.S., the DPRK would have concentrated its efforts on social and economic development rather than on nuclear deterrence to deter a war.
					
					But it was an unavoidable choice for self-defence.

articles.title: All Provocations against Korean People Condemned by Organizations of Bulgaria, Czech Republic
articles.content:
All Provocations against Korean People Condemned by Organizations of Bulgaria, Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bulgaria and the Czech Republic issued statements in support of the just cause of the Korean people for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said in a statement on March 21 that the U.S. is behind the tension mounting on the Korean Peninsula as it prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating the unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" aimed to stifle the DPRK.
					
					It condemned the U.S. and its satellite forces for staging the mad-cap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, nuclear war drills against the DPRK, adding:
					
					The heroic Korean people turned out in an all-out action for defending the country's sovereignty and dignity to cope with the vicious hostile moves of the U.S. and its allies against the DPRK.
					
					We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle for frustrating the provocations of the hostile forces and defending socialism.
					
					The U.S. and its allies should immediately halt their anti-DPRK provocations and hostile moves.
					
					The Youth Communists' Union of Czechoslovakia in its statement on March 25 condemned the reckless joint war drills being carried out by the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					The statement said: The Korean people under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea have the right to safeguard all the gains they achieved in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					We call for international solidarity with the Korean people's struggle and oppose all kinds of provocations against them.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People's Anti-U.S. Sacred Action Expressed by Organizations of Romania, UK
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People's Anti-U.S. Sacred Action Expressed by Organizations of Romania, UK
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Romania and the UK extended solidarity to the Korean people all out in their sacred action against the U.S. on March 22.
					The Romanian Workers' Association in a statement said the U.S. let B-52 fly into the sky above the Korean Peninsula against the backdrop of a touch-and-go situation prevailing there due to the frantic joint war drills being staged by the U.S. and south Korean authorities, thus escalating the tension.
					
					It said the spokesmen for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK Foreign Ministry declared in their statements that the DPRK would deal merciless retaliatory blows at the U.S. becoming evermore undisguised in its threat and blackmail, adding that this was an entirely just measure for self-defence.
					
					With nothing can the U.S. hurt the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, it noted, and continued:
					
					The U.S. should immediately withdraw all its military hardware from south Korea and roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, bearing deep in mind that it is quite different from Iraq or Libya. 
					
					We send solidarity to the Korean people all out in a sacred action against the U.S.
					
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said in their joint statement:
					
					It is a grave provocation against the DPRK that the U.S. sent B-52, a means for nuclear attack, to the sky above the Korean Peninsula and nuclear powered submarine to waters off it. This is an indication of the U.S. scenario for a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK will dynamically advance along the road of Songun and meet all challenges of the hostile forces under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will never be frightened by warning, threat and blackmail of the U.S. 
					
					We voice full support for the steps for self-defence taken by the DPRK and demand the U.S. forces quit south Korea at once.

articles.title: Army and People of DPRK Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Army and People of DPRK Supported Abroad
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The international community fully supports the army and people of the DPRK all out in the struggle to defend the dignity of independence as Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il's Korea and the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					The Guinea-DPRK Friendship Association stated as follows:
					
					The U.S. fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" through the UN Security Council over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes in December last year labeling it as a "long-range missile launch". It is now escalating military provocations against the DPRK. 
					
					The chieftain aggravating the tension on the Korean Peninsula is the U.S. and its allies as they resort to the moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions in its statement said that to cope with the vicious moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK, it nullified the Korean Armistice Agreement and declared that it would exercise the right to preemptive nuclear attack to destroy the strongholds of the aggressors. 
					
					The DPRK's nuclear deterrence only can thwart the U.S. aggression and use of nukes, the statement added. 
					
					The Jordanian paper Al Diyar said the army and people of the DPRK would never be a passive onlooker to the sovereignty of the nation being violated and the supreme interests of the country threatened. 
					
					The U.S. Institute for Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its statement urged the U.S. government to withdraw the hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the war exercises against it for peace and stability of the U.S.
					
					The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the service personnel and people united around Marshal Kim Jong Un in single mind will never miss a golden chance and victoriously conclude the standoff with the U.S. and the great war for national reunification. 
					
					The director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea said that the U.S. should behave itself, clearly understanding that the army and people of the DPRK do not make an empty talk.

articles.title: Japanese Denounces U.S. Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Denounces U.S. Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Sadao Shibano, representative of the Japanese Society for Current Events Studies, on March 2 posted on website an article disclosing the aggressive nature and injustice of the U.S. policy towards the DPRK. 
					In the article the author raised a question why does the U.S. violate the right of the DPRK. 
					
					It went on:
					
					What is the reason that the U.S.-led imperialist forces run amuck with the political and military pressure and economic sanctions against the DPRK?
					
					It is because the DPRK values the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation. 
					
					To defend the legitimate right, the DPRK could not but resolutely react to the moves of the U.S. imperialists to disguise the nuclear threat as just one. 
					
					For the U.S. the Korean Peninsula is like a strategic vantage for restraining the forces hindering its ambition for world domination. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists divided Korea and ignited the Korean War and after the war it turned south Korea into the biggest arsenal of nuclear weapons in the Far East. 
					
					The aim of the U.S. and its allies is to stifle socialist Korea. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists threatened the DPRK with nukes during the last Korean War. After the war they drafted various plans for a war of aggression aiming at preemptive nuclear attack and have worked hard to implement them. The U.S. is the chief architect of the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					The article called upon the international community to sharpen vigilance against the U.S. brigandish moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A rally and demonstration took place in Osaka, Japan on March 24 in demand of the application of tuition-waiver program for senior high schools to the Korean schools in Japan and payment of subsidies.
					The actions were attended by officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan in Kinki, other Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens, more than 3 000 in all.
					
					At the rally speakers protested against the Japanese government and local self-governing bodies' unreasonable discrimination against Koreans schools.
					
					They charged that it is unreasonable to refuse to apply the program to Korean schools only unlike other foreign schools.
					
					They called for pooling efforts to fight to the last to protect the Korean schools and ensure the Korean students' right to learn.
					
					Then they staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un firma finalmente el plan de ataque de fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un firma finalmente el plan de ataque de fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- Entran en la grave etapa las acciones agresivas del imperialismo norteamericano contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cuales violan la soberania y los maximos intereses de ella.
					Pese a las reiteradas advertencias, el imperialismo norteamericano envio uno tras otro al cielo sobre el Sur de Corea los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-52.
					
					Insatisfechos de ello, mando el dia 28, por primera vez en la historia, los medios de ataque estrategico, inclusive los bombarderos tipo Stealth B-2A provenientes de la base aerea de Whiteman del Estado de Missouri, para cometer abiertamente el grave acto provocador de ejercitar el ataque a los simulados blancos terrestres de la RPDC.
					
					El hecho muestra patentemente que llega al extremo la ambicion agresiva de los imperialistas yanquis que intentan enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC desoyendo la advertencia de profundo significado de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas, expresada a traves de la declaracion fechada 26 de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Frente a tal situacion critica, el Mariscal  Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del EPC, convoco urgentemente a las 0:30 del dia 29 en la Comandancia Suprema la reunion operacional sobre el cumplimiento de la mision de ataque artillero de las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas del EPC.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Hyon Yong Chol, el jefe del departamento de operacion, Ri Yong Gil, el jefe del departamento general de exploracion, Kim Yong Chol, y el comandante de las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas Kim Rak Gyom.
					
					Ante todo, el Comandante Supremo recibio el parte del general de ejercito de fuerzas terrestres Kim Yong Chol, subjefe del Estado Mayor General y jefe del departamento general de exploracion del EPC, sobre las caracteristicas de accion de los medios de ataque nuclear de las fuerzas agresoras norteamericanas 
					
					Acto seguido, escucho el informe del teniente general de fuerzas terrestres Kim Rak Gyom sobre el estado tecnico de los medios de ataque estrategico del EPC y tomo una decision importante.
					
					Reconocio que la situacion dada le hace juzgar que llego la hora de ajustar las cuentas finales con el imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Examino y firmo finalmente el plan de ataque artillero de las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas apuntando que si los imperialistas yanquis abren el fuego con enormes fuerzas estrategicas introducidas en suelo surcoreano, hay que atacar implacablemente las bases de ellos ubicadas en el territorio estadounidense-bastion de agresores-, Hawai, la isla Guam y las demas zonas operacionales del Pacifico y las otras en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					El hecho de que los imperialistas norteamericanos despacharon hasta B-2A al cielo surcoreano, comprueba otra vez que la accion hostil anti-RPDC sobrepaso la etapa de amenaza y chantaje y entro en la fase de accion imprudente, apunto.
					
					La presencia de B-2A no es una simple demostracion de fuerza frente a la posicion intransigente de la RPDC sino el ultimatum de provocar a toda costa la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, asevero y agrego que hay que poner punto final a la epoca en que el imperialismo norteamericano chantajea y amenaza a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					Senalo que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC responderan con ataque nuclear despiadado al chantaje nuclear y con guerra total de justicia a la guerra de agresion.
					
					Firmo finalmente el plan de procesos de preparacion tecnica de los cohetes estrategicos dando la indicacion de entrar en el estado de espera de la orden de fuego para poder atacar en cualquier momento las bases norteamericanas arriba mencionadas.
					
					Diciendo que los enemigos traen por fin el nubarron de guerra nuclear examinando la paciencia de la RPDC, subrayo que ya no se puede aguantar mas y ordeno en tono rotundo reducir lo todo a cenizas con el primer golpe una vez dada la orden.
					
					En estos momentos tambien, los valientes oficiales y soldados del EPC y todos los habitantes de la RPDC estan esperando la orden final del Comite Central del PTC vibrando de indignacion por las acciones del imperialismo norteamericano para provocar la guerra y redoblando la voluntad de levantarse en la batalla de vida o muerte con los enemigos, apunto.
					
					Enfatizo que el EPC no quedara con brazos cruzados ante las demenciales maniobras agresivas del imperialismo norteamericano, sino hara todo lo posible para defender el destino del pais y la nacion.
					
					La historia comprobo la verdad de que en el mundo no existe el que pueda detener al pueblo movilizado en su causa justa, acoto y dijo en tono energico que si estalla otra vez en este territorio la guerra no deseada como consecuencia de las acciones imperdonables del imperialismo norteamericano, estos sufriran el vergonzoso arruinamiento y la gran nacion coreana acogera el nuevo y maravilloso dia de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La decision importante, tomada por el Mariscal bajo la situacion severa en que se ha encendido la mecha de guerra nuclear por culpa del imperialismo norteamericano, marcara un hito trascendental en abrir la nueva pagina de la historia poniendo punto final a la historia de enfrentamiento con EE.UU. que prosigue de siglo en siglo.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua labores de varios dominios de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua labores de varios dominios de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Yong Rim, averiguo en el terreno los trabajos de varios dominios de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Recorriendo la Fabrica de Cojinetes de Ryangchaek y la granja cooperativa de Jangsan del distrito de Ryongchon, Choe estudio detalladamente el estado de produccion y renovacion tecnica y los preparativos agricolas.
					
					Estimulo a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de unidades concernientes quienes solucionaron los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que se presentan en la materializacion de la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de nacionalizar las materias primas, desarrollar los productos de alta eficiencia y aplicar el metodo de agricultura organica con paludinas.
					
					Convoco en los terrenos las reuniones consultivas.
					
					En las ocasiones, se destaco la importancia de la combinacion de la produccion con la renovacion tecnica y se abordaron las medidas para perfeccionar el proceso productivo manteniendo el estado de maxima vigilancia conforme a la situacion critica creada.
					
					Los foros tomaron las medidas para suministrar con satisfaccion las materias primas, materiales,  abonos, etc. necesarios a modernizar el proceso productivo e incrementar el rendimiento de la cosecha de cereales por hectarea.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia a EE.UU. y belicistas surcoreanos que aumentan el peligro de guerra
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia a EE.UU. y belicistas surcoreanos que aumentan el peligro de guerra
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 28 la siguiente declaracion:
					Recientemente Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos inventaron el "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local" aumentando el peligro de guerra. 
					
					Segun ese documento firmado por el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere, las tropas yanquis se incorporaran automaticamente a la "provocacion local" del Norte (de Corea) y haran frente conjunto con el ejercito titere.
					
					El plan enumera detalladamente el contenido y proyectos operacionales sobre las contramedidas conjuntas. 
					
					Al respecto, los titeres surcoreanos dicen que se ha preparado el "aparato legal e institucional que permite la intervencion automatica de las tropas estadounidenses en el combate local", "EE.UU. consintio el principio de castigar el foco de provocacion y hasta las fuerzas de apoyo y de mando" y "pueden castigar inmediata y rotundamente cualquier provocacion del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					De esta manera, se ha revelado mas claramente la naturaleza de EE.UU. como caudillos y autores de la provocacion local junto con los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Pues, ese documento de guerra de agresion al Norte es la abierta declaracion de guerra agresiva contra la RPDC.
					
					En la actualidad cualquier conflicto en la Peninsula Coreana no se limitara a la guerra local sino se extendera en un instante a la guerra total, la nuclear.
					
					Debido a las graves maniobras de provocacion de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, se anularon completamente el Acuerdo de Armisticio, el acuerdo de no agresion Norte-Sur y la declaracion conjunta de desnuclearizacion y no existe ningun aparato capaz de frenar la guerra.
					
					Para colmo, frente a las siniestras tentativas de los yanquis y los belicistas surcoreanos de danar atrevidamente los monumentos a la eternidad y elogio a los lideres, simbolos de maxima dignidad de la RPDC, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea ya declaro las acciones militares contra los objetos militares y las instituciones enemigas de gobernacion del Sur de Corea, el territorio norteamericano y las bases militares norteamericanas en el Pacifico incluyendo Hawai y la isla Guam. 
					
					?Acaso EE.UU y los belicistas surcoreanos han imaginado que consecuencias catastroficas traera dicho "plan"?
					
					Es una tonteria el intento de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana de amenazar con talas farsas a la RPDC. 
					
					La enemistad y la colera de los militares y civiles de la RPDC llegan al cielo.
					
					La firma de dicho plan brinda mayor justeza a las acciones militares practicas de la RPDC que apunta con superprecision Chongwadae en Seul y la Casa Blanca en Washington.
					
					Es una ilusion vana el que la camarilla titere pretende buscar refugio bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					Nunca puede proteger a los titeres el paraguas nuclear de EE.UU. que no surtira efecto ante el fuerte ataque nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, que ya entraron en la sagrada guerra final para defender la soberania del pais y la maxima dignidad, aniquilaran completamente de nuestro planeta a EE.UU., caudillo de agresion, y a los belicistas surcoreanos proyanquis.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP divulga informacion no.1027
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP divulga informacion no. 1027
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica la siguiente informacion no. 1027:
					En la actualidad, el ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se levantaron como un solo hombre en la gran guerra sagrada de liquidacion a los enemigos explotando la vehemente hostilidad e indignacion contra los imperialistas norteamericanos y la horda de traidores surcoreanos que se atreven a atacar el simbolo de la maxima dignidad del pais.
					
					Sobre todo, informados de la declaracion de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, todos los uniformados y civiles coreanos estan bien dispuestos de dar castigo duro y despiadado de venganza a los infames provocadores y lograr la victoria final de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Muy atemorizada, la camarilla titere difama las medidas de sobredureza de la RPDC diciendo que todos son la "orquestacion intencional para consolidar el regimen" y difunde las desinformaciones de toda indole calumniando la maxima dignidad de esta.
					
					Esto es el ultimo esfuerzo de los desmayados ante el poderio invencible de la RPDC, donde todos los uniformados y civiles estan unidos compactamente en torno al genial Comandante del monte Paektu, y ante el impetu de ellos de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					La horda titere ya perdio siquiera el sentido sobre la realidad.
					
					Es muy absurdo que los compinches del gobierno titere actual, que no concluyeron  todavia la composicion del "poder" por incontables casos de corrupcion y escandalo aunque paso mas de un mes  y ganan la tasa muy baja de apoyo de la opinion publica, hablan de la "inquietud del regimen" de alguien.
					
					Tan pronto como inicio su trabajo, el nuevo gobierno titere oculta la situacion critica de si mismo y divulga diversos rumores malignas para manchar el alto prestigio e imagen internacionales de la RPDC y evitar el fuego de venganza, lo cual provoca solamente la burla de las personas.
					
					Seria una ilusion necia si piensa que puede difamar aun en lo minimo la unidad monolitica y la imagen de la digna RPDC con tales rumores intrigantes.
					
					La banda de traidores titeres debe saber correctamente que las recientes declaraciones de la potencia del monte Paektu, inclusive la de Comandancia Suprema del EPC, son la explosion de la conviccion y voluntad de los militares y civiles de la RPDC de defender al lider a riesgo de la vida.
					
					Los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC nunca perdonaran a todos los que se atreven a difamar su maxima dignidad y regimen y les castigaran rotundamente como ya habia declarado.
					
					Y advierten otra vez que prestan la atencion especial a lo que los palabrotes intrigantes anti-RPDC de la banda titere se recrudecen mas bajo instigacion de la nueva duena de Chongwadae.
					
					La horda de traidores surcoreanos no evadira el castigo duro.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia a politiqueros surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia a politiqueros surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos  dias, los titeres surcoreanos se suman activamente a la campana de complot anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos vinculando atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de ella con el "problema de DD.HH".
					En su mensaje enviado a la "entrevista de prensa para felicitar el establecimiento del comite de investigacion de DDHH", el representante del "Partido Saenuri" Hwang U Ryo pronuncio unos chismes como la "investigacion del responsable de la violacion de DDHH del Norte (de Corea)" y el "castigo".
					
					En particular, el ex viceministro de Unificacion Kim Sok U peroro censurando la maxima dignidad de la RPDC que si se presenta el "resultado de investigacion", la RPDC puede recibir la "sancion de sociedad internacional".
					
					Todo el mundo califica el establecimiento del organo intrigante anti-RPDC por el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, titere de EE.UU., como conducta extravagante para castigar a los Estados determinados.
					
					Hwang y Kim son basuras humanas que se entregan a la confrontacion fratricida para su amo norteamericano.
					
					Ellos intensificaron en la delantera la confrontacion fratricida y la desconfianza interregional tildando a las fuerzas progresistas surcoreanas por la reunificacion como las "pro-Norte".
					
					Son maniacos de enfrentamiento que calumniaron el regimen de la RPDC hablando del supuesto sistema "hereditario" y la "inestabilidad politica".
					
					Sus disparates sobre "DDHH" no pasan de ser un engano para ocultar sus actos vendepatrias.
					
					Aunque hablaron tanto de los "derechos humanos", esos alcahuetes politicos cometieron mas que nadie los crimenes anti-DDHH.
					
					Lo comprueban el secuestro y rapto de los connacionales en los terceros paises, oficios a que se dedicaban Hwang U Ryo desde su militancia en el "Partido Saenuri" y Kim Sok U desde que dejara el cargo de viceministro de Unificacion.
					
					Diciendo la "inmigracion libre" y el "asentamiento democratico", los titeres surcoreanos comenten astutamente la seduccion y secuestro a los connacionales, lo cual constituye un acto criminal antinacional y antietico que hace surgir los "familiares separados" del nuevo siglo.
					
					La conducta de ellos no es nada mas que la trata de esclavos de version contemporanea de los estafadores que quieren despojar hasta las miserables sumas que se pagan a los "fugitivos norcoreanos" para su "asentamiento".
					
					Es tan claro cuales son estos tipejos que imponen a las "fugitivas del Norte" la amenaza sexual y promueven el secuestro bajo el pretexto de la "libertad" y los "DDHH".
					
					Por sus travesuras en los paises vecinos, ellos fueron tildados de "objetos prohibidos de entrar en el pais".
					
					Estas escorias humanas carentes de calificacion de la nacion coreana y del ser humano se atrevieron a calumniar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo ya declararon claramente la voluntad de aniquilar sin piedad a quienes atentan la dignidad maxima de la nacion, aunque paguen cualquier precio.
					
					Nuestras acciones posteriores seran justas para defender los intereses de la nacion y los DDHH.
					
					Los delincuentes pagaran muy caro por sus palabras atrevidas.

articles.title: Guerra de represalia terminara con victoria de la causa de reunificacion, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Guerra de represalia terminara con victoria de la causa de reunificacion, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- Llegan al borde de guerra nuclear los actos hostiles anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos que crecen gradualmente cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC con fines pacificos.
					Para chequear finalmente los preparativos de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, el secretario adjunto del Departamento de Defensa norteamericano ordeno iniciarla diciendo publicamente que el circulo militar norteamericano concede mayor prioridad a la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Seguidamente, el comandante de tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano y las autoridades de la capa militar surcoreana suscribieron el "plan de operaciones conjuntas fundamentado en hacer frente a la provocacion local" con la guerra nuclear total.
					
					Insatisfecho de despachar tres veces el bombardero estrategico nuclear "B-52" al cielo surcoreano, el imperio desarrolla abiertamente el entrenamiento de ataque a blancos terrestres de la RPDC mandando el dia 28 por primera vez de la historia el bombardero estrategico Stealth "B-2A", desplegado en el territorio norteamericano, y otros medios de ataque estrategico.
					
					Hoy en dia, el acto hostil anti-RPDC entro en la imprudente etapa sobrepasando la fase de simple chantaje.
					
					Puesto que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se halla en la etapa peligrosa debido a las maquinaciones agresivas anti-RPDC de EE.UU., los defensores de la justicia entraron en la fase final de confrontacion total antiyanqui para defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion.
					
					El Comandante Supremo ordeno que los cohetes estrategicos entraran en el estado de espera de fuego para atacar en cualquier momento al territorio norteamericano, las bases de tropas agresoras yanquis en Hawai, la isla Guam y en la zona operacional del Pacifico y las otras estacionadas en suelo surcoreano y firmo finalmente el plan de proceso de preparacion tecnica de los cohetes estrategicos.
					
					Nuestra fuerte contramedida para la defensa de soberania es una muestra de la inconmovible conviccion y voluntad de ejercito y pueblo coreanos de defender a costa de la vida la patria y el socialismo desde las agresiones de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas son poderoso ejercito revolucionario armado de autoctonas tacticas y dotado de medios de ataque y defensa al estilo coreano capaces de hacer frente a cualquier guerra moderna.
					
					Se palpita en corazon de todos los uniformados y civiles el espiritu de defensa de la patria manifestado en la decada de 1950.
					
					Las voces que reclaman exterminar a los enemigos, que se oyen a lo largo y ancho del pais, es la expresion de revanchismo contra el imperio yanqui y los titeres surcoreanos que imponen desgracias y sufrimientos al pueblo coreano de siglo en siglo.
					
					El momento, en que los belicistas desencadenen la guerra nuclear, terminara con la victoria de la gran batalla por la reunificacion de la patria, que ansiaban nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					La supremacia militar y tecnica ya no es monopolio de los imperialistas y termino para siempre la epoca en que los enemigos nos amenazaban con armas nucleares.
					
					!Que no se hagan ilusion los enemigos!
					
					Los cuerpos de ejercito del frente, las unidades de fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y las otras de cohetes estrategicos, el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y la Guardia Juvenil Roja entraron todos en el enfrentamiento total.
					
					Con un aprieto de boton de disparo, nuestros diversificados medios de ataque nuclear de precision al estilo coreano atacaran los bastiones enemigos.
					
					Los enemigos se reduciran a cenizas sin tener siguiera el tiempo de arrepentirse de haber desestimado la advertencia de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC de que si ellos provocan por fin la guerra de agresion, desde ese momento correra el tiempo mas fatigoso en que sera descontado minuto por minuto y segundo por segundo su destino miserable.
					
					Nuestras contramedidas intransigentes no son para amenazar a alguien sino constituyen una opcion para defender la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion.
					
					Nadie podra detener al pueblo coreano levantado en su causa justa.
